A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First of all\, did not feel like a Star Wars movie. As a stand alone movie I’d maybe give it 2.5 stars but the plot was dry as can be. I feel as if they forced some comedy in spots where it didn’t belong. Cheesy one liners ruined action scenes for me. Overall just one big mess of a movie. Disney you have officially ended my interest in Star Wars.
